text: François Scarborough Clemmons (born April 23, 1945) is an African-American singer, actor, playwright, and university lecturer, best known for his appearances on Mister Rogers' Neighborhood from 1968 to 1993. Clemmons is openly gay. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Clip from final appearance on Mister Rogers' Neighborhood Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:African-American singers Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT singers Category:American LGBT writers Category:Gay men Category:American playwrights Category:American television actors Category:Educators from Birmingham, Alabama Category:LGBT people from Alabama Category:Actors from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Writers from Alabama Category:Singers from Alabama
title: François Clemmons
